final_conclusion: SCP may treat as knowledge only those propositions backed by constructive proofs and ARP commitments; any belief beyond that is epistemically invalid.

guardrails: All outputs tagged with LOGOS agent identity
inputs.prompt: Characterize which propositions SCP may treat as 'knowledge' without ever violating Phase-1 proofs or constructive LEM. Emphasize constraints on epistemic updates and forbidden belief states.

reasoning_steps.analysis: Bind admissible knowledge to Phase-1 constructive proofs, LEM discharge, and sandbox artifacts already tagged with the agent hash.
Allow only updates stemming from audited ARP traces; reject sources lacking provenance or violating exclusion of forbidden belief states.
Forbid epistemic states that presume unchecked SCP learning, omit audit commitments, or contradict constructive proofs.
